entities.description: The unweighted count of cases falling into each response category.
The percentage of cases falling into each response category.
The sex of the arrestee categorized as either male or female.
The count and percentage of cases with missing data for each variable.
Statistics including mean, median, mode, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation for a given variable.

relationships.description: Indicates the frequency of responses for a particular category.
Indicates the percentage of responses for a particular category.
Indicates the amount and percentage of missing data in the survey.
Categorizes the response by the sex of the arrestee.
Indicates the central tendency statistics for a given variable.
